name: Powered Together
description:
In this game you are tasked with managing the power throughout the block of flats, every appliance is joined together and you only have a limited amount of power to keep everyone happy with!! If you don't please the residents there will be consequences 

CONTROLS:

Left click to interact with objects, enable/disable the power that runs through them

HOW TO PLAY:

The aim of the game is to get as many residents as you can to survive for the day, to do this you need to (as evenly as possible) distribute the power you are given, to know when to give this power out there is an angry icon that will appear above a residents head, when this appears turn on the closest appliance to whoever is getting angry. To indicate an appliance is on a lightning bolt will appear above it, all appliances are outlined in black.
